Rulings.Tengu: ●While “Grasschopper’s” effect is active, if “Grasschopper” attacks a monster and your opponent activates “Magic Cylinder” to negate the attack, “Grasschopper” can attack that same monster again.

Rulings.Base: 1. While the effect of "Grasschopper" is active, if "Grasschopper" attacks a monster and your opponent activates "Magic Cylinder" to negate the attack, "Grasschopper" can attack that same monster again.
